title: G.B.F.
description: When Tanner is outed as a school's only openly gay student, three popular girls engage in an epic fight to acquire him as their "Gay Best Friend."
actors: Michael J. Willett, Paul Iacono, Sasha Pieterse, Andrea Bowen

description: Carpet dealer and UFO photo forger Arif is abducted by aliens. On the planet Gora, he helps friends escape from a meteorite strike and find freedom.
actors: Cem Yılmaz, Rasim Öztekin, Özkan Uğur, İdil Fırat

title: Gabbar Is Back
description: After a vengeful college professor targets corruption in the government, he adopts the name "Gabbar" and becomes a hero to a weary public.
actors: Akshay Kumar, Shruti Haasan, Sunil Grover, Kareena Kapoor

title: Gabriel and the Mountain
description: In a drama based on a true story, Brazilian backpacker Gabriel Buchmann spends his gap year exploring Africa. Why does he die in the Malawi mountains?
actors: João Pedro Zappa, Caroline Abras, Alex Alembe, Leonard Siampala

description: An Indian man who has become a major business mogul in Canada must return to his homeland where he's reviled due to being wrongly branded a traitor.
actors: Harbhajan Mann, Manpneet Grewal, Ashish Duggal, Girja Shankar

description: This biopic of Russian cosmonaut Yuri Gagarin follows his rise from childhood poverty to his selection and training for the 1961 Vostok mission.

description: Sparks fly between the new girl at school and the misfit with a passion for music. Yet the world threatens to put a stop to their innocent love song.

title: Gallipoli
description: Explore the World War I Gallipoli battle through dramatic reenactments, 3D animation and interviews with noted experts in this meticulous docudrama.

description: Seeking revenge on his abusive boss, a London art curator conspires with an eccentric Texas rodeo queen to sell the wealthy man a fake Monet.

title: Game Face
description: This documentary follows the struggle of transgender MMA fighter Fallon Fox and gay basketball player Terrence Clemens for acceptance by their sports.
actors: Fallon Fox, Terrence Clemens

title: Gandu

description: Teams of recently deceased people who've been revived and given high-tech weapons must cooperate to defeat an army of monsters in Tokyo and Osaka.
actors: Daisuke Ono, M・A・O, Tomohiro Kaku, Saori Hayami

description: The lives of a fundamentalist online troll and a woman reeling from a sex tape gone viral become dangerously intertwined in this provocative thriller.
actors: Tanmay Dhanania, Trimala Adhikari, Satarupa Das, Satchit Puranik

title: Garuda in My Heart
description: A determined boy will do anything to become a great soccer player, despite the wishes of his grandfather.

description: A young soccer player sets out to prove he can lead his team to a championship -- but being a winner is about more than just talent.
actors: Emir Mahira, Aldo Tansani, Maudy Koesnaedi, Ramzi

title: Gayby Baby
description: This documentary follows four youngsters as they navigate the challenges of their preteen years, including society's bias against their gay parents.

description: The night spins sinisterly out of control when incompetent kidnappers hold a club-hopping record exec and a socialite for ransom in this dark comedy.

title: Gelo
description: A Punjabi woman who works on a farm must endure the difficulties of living in an oppressive class-based society and a dysfunctional community.
actors: Jaspinder Cheema, Pavan Malhotra, Gurjit Singh, Dilawar Sidhu

title: Gender Revolution: A Journey with Katie Couric
description: Katie Couric explores our evolving understanding of gender identity, speaking with transgender and intersex individuals about their experiences.
actors: Katie Couric

description: New-generation bodybuilding stars -- including Rich Piana, Kai Greene and Calum von Moger -- share their experiences competing in the demanding sport.

description: Narrated by Kevin Kline, this movie version of the timeless Yuletide fantasy -- produced by George Balanchine -- features the New York City Ballet.
actors: Kevin Kline, Jessica Lynn Cohen, Macaulay Culkin, Bart Robinson Cook

description: Now married and raising a son, clumsy ape-man George finds his jungle kingdom in peril as Really Mean Lion challenges him for the throne.

description: When her husband's sex game goes wrong, Jessie -- handcuffed to a bed in a remote lake house -- faces warped visions, dark secrets and a dire choice.

description: Two kids and their pet dog (aka the Ghost Patrol) get a call about an old manor and soon find they are investigating their first real haunted house.

description: With help from his best friend and a public-access psychic, a nerdy young man assembles his dream team of like-minded ghost hunters.

description: As Motoko and Batou attempt to thwart a mysterious terrorist group, Togusa tracks the killer of a man with a prosthetic leg made by Mermaid's Leg.
actors: Maaya Sakamoto, Ikkyu Juku, Kenichirou Matsuda, Tarusuke Shingaki

description: Freed of her responsibilities for the 501 Organization, Motoko must now learn how to take orders from Aramaki.

description: Parapsychologists create a business exterminating ghouls and hobgoblins -- and end up facing one killer demon in a cellist's apartment.

description: This engaging sequel finds the ghostbusting trio saving the Big Apple from a massive slime attack and a flood of evil spirits on New Year's Eve.

description: Indonesian activist Soe Hok Gie experiences a political awakening during the tumultuous regimes of Suharto and Sukarno. Inspired by true events.
actors: Nicholas Saputra, Sita Nursanti, Lukman Sardi, Indra Birowo

description: With the Cold War looming over them, teen best pals Ginger and Rosa share everything in early 1960s London -- until betrayal drives them apart.

description: Teenager Skylar Lewis discovers that her parents have a secret avocation when she innocently releases a cache of monsters in the family basement.

title: Girlfriend's Day
description: When he's caught up in a deadly conspiracy, an unemployed greeting card writer must create the perfect card for a new holiday to save his skin.
actors: Bob Odenkirk, Amber Tamblyn, Natasha Lyonne, Alex Karpovsky

description: After they're bullied at school, three teenage girls wonder if it's better to be a boy, then get their wish thanks to the nectar of a magical flower.

title: Given
description: A surfing adventure across 15 countries gives a young boy from Kauai an opportunity to widen his horizons and gain a deeper understanding of life.

title: GLOW: The Story of the Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling
description: This engaging documentary chronicles the 1980s phenomenon "The Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling," which elevated its female grapplers to star status.

description: After moving into a new house with her mom, high schooler Chloe discovers a troupe of talking garden gnomes who need her help saving the world.

description: A maverick leader and a clever young general take on Japanese pirates amid bureaucratic intrigue in Ming Dynasty China.

description: In Yorkshire, a withdrawn gay farmer begins a torrid affair with a Romanian migrant worker who shows him the depths of his capacity for affection.

title: God's Pocket
description: A blue collar worker tries to cover things up when his stepson is killed in a suspicious accident, but a local reporter senses that something's amiss.

description: On Earth, Haruo and his companions make contact with the indigenous Houtua tribe. To defeat Godzilla, they set out for the old Mechagodzilla facility.

description: After moving to Australia, an American teen convinces her new friends to form a cheer squad and take on their biggest rivals in competition.
actors: Kelli Berglund, Emily Morris, Terry Rogers, Jess Kuss

title: Gold
description: A man returns home after a 10-year absence to reconnect with his ex-wife and daughter, but finds them living with his domineering former P.E. teacher.
actors: James Nesbitt, David Wilmot, Kerry Condon, Maisie Williams

title: Golden Time
description: In the 1980s, a recently discarded television set from the 1960s refuses to accept its fate and tries to break out of the junkyard.

description: Hapless brothers Gollu and Pappu stumble into a terrorist plot and end up being ordered to detonate a bomb, a task they are destined to bungle.
actors: Vir Das, Sandeepa Dhar, Dimple Kapadia, Kunaal Roy Kapur

title: Golmaal Returns
description: A man's relationship with his jealous wife enters choppy waters after he has to spend a night on a yacht with a woman he's rescued from gangsters.
actors: Ajay Devgn, Kareena Kapoor, Arshad Warsi, Tusshar Kapoor

title: Gone Baby Gone
description: When a 4-year-old girl vanishes from a rough Boston neighborhood and cops offer little help, her family hires two private detectives to find answers.

description: A British-raised youth and the Nigerian elder brother he's never met struggle to connect and accept each other's culturally different worlds.
actors: Malachi Kirby, Adelayo Adedayo, Shanika Warren-Markland, Bhasker Patel

title: Good Kids
description: Four overachieving friends spend the summer after finishing high school doing everything possible to enjoy the party life and ruin their reputations.
actors: Nicholas Braun, Zoey Deutch, Mateo Arias, Israel Broussard

description: As Tommy Egan pilots armed drones over Afghanistan from the safe comfort of Las Vegas, the remote nature of his work begins to raise moral questions.

title: Good People
description: A struggling couple can't believe their luck when they find a stash of money in the apartment of a neighbor who was recently murdered.
actors: James Franco, Kate Hudson, Tom Wilkinson, Omar Sy

title: Good Will Hunting
description: When professors discover that an aimless janitor is also a math genius, a therapist helps the young man confront the demons that are holding him back.
actors: Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård

title: Goodbye Lover
description: Obsessively upbeat Sandra is married to a hard-drinking ad executive and having a fling with his brother, who is also sleeping with his secretary.
actors: Patricia Arquette, Dermot Mulroney, Mary-Louise Parker, Ellen DeGeneres

title: Gook
description: Amidst the looting and chaos of the LA riots, two Korean-American brothers fight to save their struggling shoe store while contemplating their future.
actors: Simone Baker, Justin Chon, David So, Curtiss Cook Jr.

title: Goon
description: When he's seen dispatching a rude opposing hockey player in the stands, Doug Glatt is hired by a rival team ... for his fighting skills.
actors: Seann William Scott, Jay Baruchel, Liev Schreiber, Alison Pill

description: Injury and family push hockey player Doug Glatt into retirement, but his plans change when his beloved former team appoints his nemesis as captain.

title: Görümce
description: When his jealous sister plots to wreck his engagement, a young man does everything he can to protect his betrothed from her devious schemes.
actors: Eda Ece, Dilşah Demir, Gupse Özay, Buğra Gülsoy

title: Graduation
description: A morally conflicted father wrestles with what’s best for his college-bound daughter when she’s brutally attacked right before an important exam.

description: Leaving their wives at home, three randy friends look forward to some raunchy extramarital fun at their college reunion.

description: Anticipating the next move in a serial killer's grisly game, a police chief realizes that his daughter and estranged wife are the next likely victims.

description: When his father is sent to prison, a 13-year-old boy is placed in the care of his estranged brother, a marijuana grower in Northern California.
actors: Jimmy Baxter, Ryon Baxter, David Fine, Shelley Mitchell

actors: Anton Yelchin, Imogen Poots, Patrick Stewart, Alia Shawkat

description: Three young Nigerian bohemians, each from one of the country's major ethnic groups, explore the directions in which their lives could go.

title: Growing Up Coy
description: Filmmakers follow a Colorado family's highly public battle for the rights of their transgender daughter, Coy, in a landmark civil rights case.

title: Growing Up Wild
description: Five baby animals from different parts of the world grow up learning to survive in the wild, nurtured by the love and guidance of their families.
actors: Daveed Diggs

title: Gun City
description: In 1921 Barcelona, amid unrest between anarchists and the police, a cop plays both sides to learn who stole army weapons that could ignite a civil war.
actors: Luis Tosar, Michelle Jenner, Vicente Romero, Manolo Solo

title: Gun Runners
description: Two roaming Kenyan bandits attempt to change the course of their lives by exchanging their rifles for running shoes.

description: When the daughter of a wealthy family returns from college, she gets a frosty welcome from her brother, who has problems -- and plans -- of his own.

title: Guru
description: Ambitious Gurukant Desai ignores his father's advice and leaves his village to find success in Turkey.
actors: Abhishek Bachchan, Mithun Chakraborty, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Madhavan
